resp = client.search(
    index=".watcher-history*",
    pretty=True,
    query={
        "bool": {
            "must": [
                {
                    "match": {
                        "result.condition.met": True
                    }
                },
                {
                    "range": {
                        "result.execution_time": {
                            "from": "now-10s"
                        }
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
